channel.title: CVE Feed for fastify -- fastify-http-proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fastify -- fastify-http-proxy

item.title: CVE-2021-21322|2024-08-03T18:09:15.229Z -- fastify -- fastify-http-proxy
item.description: fastify-http-proxy is an npm package which is a fastify plugin for proxying your http requests to another server, with hooks. By crafting a specific URL, it is possible to escape the prefix of the proxied backend service. If the base url of the proxied server is `/pub/`, a user expect that accessing `/priv` on the target service would not be possible. In affected versions, it is possible. This is fixed in version 4.3.1.
